extendedInfo.description: Warning:  This soundboard contains mature language NOT suitable for kids and Not suitable for sensitive adults.  These phrases are not meant to offend anyone and are just funny sound bites from Rated R movies.  If you cannot watch Rated R movies, are easily offended, or have no sense of humor, please DO NOT install this app.  Thank You!This Joe Pesci Soundboard has lots of funny insults and these sounds can be used as ringtones.  Use this soundboard to insult your friends or just laugh when your ringtone plays a funny insult sound.Long press to save to SD card and use as ringtones and or notification.Press phone's menu button reviews.title: Don\'t update your app!
reviews.comment: This was once a great app but after an update that was issued today,  an update I thought was going to add more sound clips, it\'s now ruined. They changed it to a horrible new boring layout and added airpush. Airpush is an ad service that makes ads pop up when you close the app,  I had to close 5 apps to just get back to this.  So don\'t update your app if you already have it installed and don\'t download it if you\'re considering downloading it.
reviews.author: Michael Durbin

reviews.title: WASTE
reviews.comment: They  ruined  it  with  new  update,DONT INSTALL

reviews.title: Very Funny update
reviews.comment: \"Are you out of your mind?\" came to mind - new update wants permission to read/write contact info. I would rather have pop-ups. Prob will next update!

reviews.comment: REASON for the contact permission is to assign ringtones. Dang people, this isn\'t rocket science. Good app!!
